attributes.additional_details:
Surrey County Council's planned changes in paying 24 residents monthly fees , because of the government cuts, SCC say they cannot pay for 24 residents(me included) fees, they roughly pay £48,000 a month to keep us here, and costs in residential home fees need to be cut.
they want to cut the number of surrey residents living here, some of us affected have'nt got homes or families to go to.  this is against our human rights, and we need the specialist care the Meath Epilepsy Trust provides.
the goverment need to think yet again about these cuts, because it does have a knock-on effect in the surrounding community.
